text: ane jyare tara palanahare pharista'one kahyum ke hum dharati para janasina (nayaba) banavavano chum, to te'o'e kahyum ava vyaktine kema paida kari rahya cho, je dharati upara bhrastacara phelave ane khunamaraki'o acare? Ane ame tara namanum smarana, prasansa ane pavitratanum varnana karanara che. Allaha ta'ala'e pharamavyum je hum janum chum te tame nathi janata
